All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Account
Class for a user account.
AccountDialog
Dialog class which shows existing users' accounts and allows to create new accounts, log into existing ones or delete accounts.
AccountManager
Class responsible for managing accounts.
AccountSelectedDialog
Dialog that's displayed after user selects an account to log into.
ActionArea
Part of the main frame.
AddDialog
Dialog responsible for adding new transactions.
AllFilter
Filter for RowSorter of the table.
CustDate
Custom date class.
EditDialog
Dialog responsible for editing already existing transactions.
Expense
Extension of the Transaction class, represents an expense.
ExpenseFilter
Filter for RowSorter of the table.
ExpenseTable
Custom JTable.
ExpenseTableModel
Custom TableModel.
ExpenseView
Main part of the whole GUI.
Income
Extension of the Transaction class, represents an income.
IncomeFilter
Filter for RowSorter of the table.
ListManager
Manager class for JList of accounts.
Loader
Static class responsible for loading transactions from either "transactions_{account_name}.txt" if an account is selected, or it opens up a FileChooser dialog in which the user can manually select the desired data file.
Main
Main class of the application - creates and shows the whole GUI.
MainForm
Main form.
NewAccountDialog
Dialog that allows the creation of new user accounts.
Overview
Part of the main form.
PasswordManager
Static class that wraps encrypting/decrypting user passwords.
Repeated
Abstract class for repeated payments.
RepeatedAddDialog
Dialog responsible for adding new repeated payments.
RepeatedEditDialog
Dialog responsible for editing existing repeated payments.
RepeatedExpense
Extension of the Repeated class, represents a repeated expense.
RepeatedIncome
Extension of the Repeated class, represents a repeated income.
RepeatedTable
JTable implementation for displaying repeated payments.
RepeatedTableModel
Extension of DefaultTableModel to properly manage repeated payments.
RepeatedView
Part of the main form that displays all repeated payments present on the account.
Saver
Static class responsible for saving transactions to either "transactions_{account_name}.txt" if an account is selected, or it opens up a FileChooser dialog in which the user can manually select the desired data file.
Transaction
Abstract class for transactions.
